134 
138  template<class ComponentType, typename ...Args>
139  void Object::AddComponent(Args&&... args)
140  {
141  if (std::is_base_of<Component, ComponentType>::value)
142  {
143  if (!this->HasComponent<ComponentType>()) {
144  _components[typeid(ComponentType).name()] = std::make_unique<ComponentType>(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
145  _components[typeid(ComponentType).name()]->SetState(ComponentState::Active);
146  }
147  }
148  }
149 
153  template<class ComponentType>
154  bool Object::RemoveComponent() noexcept
155  {
156  if (this->HasComponent<ComponentType>()) {
157  auto component_iterator = _components.find(typeid(ComponentType).name());
158  _components.erase(component_iterator);
159  return true;
160  }
161  return false;
162  }
163 
167  template<class ComponentType>
168  ComponentType& Object::GetComponent() const
169  {
170  if (typeid(ComponentType) == typeid(TransformComponent) && _transform.get()){
171  return dynamic_cast<ComponentType&>(*_transform);
172  }
173  else if (std::is_base_of<Component, ComponentType>::value) {
174  if (this->HasComponent<ComponentType>()) {
175  return static_cast<ComponentType&>(*_components.at(typeid(ComponentType).name()));
176  }
177  }
178  throw ObjectException("Tried getting non-existent component: " + std::string(typeid(ComponentType).name()) + " for index: " + std::to_string(GetIndex()));
179  }
180 
184  template<class ComponentType>
185  inline bool Object::HasComponent() const noexcept
186  {
187  return (_transform.get() && dynamic_cast<ComponentType*>(_transform.get()))
188  || _components.find(typeid(ComponentType).name()) != _components.end()
189  && _components.find(typeid(ComponentType).name())->second.get();
190  }
191 
196  template<class ComponentType, typename ...OtherTypes>
197  bool Object::HasComponents() noexcept {
198  if (std::is_base_of<Component, ComponentType>::value)
199  {
200  if (sizeof...(OtherTypes) == 0) {
201  return this->HasComponent<ComponentType>();
202  }
203  return this->HasComponent<ComponentType>() && this->HasComponents< OtherTypes ... >();
204  }
205  }
206 }
